name: test-driving-lambdas
description: This project hosts visual studio code server and localstack.

scripts.preintegration: npm run build && npm run start_localstack && npm run deploy
scripts.integration: LOCALSTACK_HOSTNAME=localstack-${MYPORT} TABLE_NAME=ExchangeRateTable LAMBDA_ID=$(aws apigateway get-rest-apis --endpoint-url=http://localstack-${MYPORT}:4566 | grep id | grep -oP '(\d|\w){10}') jest --testMatch **/integration/**/*.integration.test.ts
scripts.start_localstack: docker run --rm -d -p 4566:4566 -p 4571:4571 --name localstack-${MYPORT} --network code-server-network --network-alias localstack -e SERVICES=iam,lambda,dynamodb,apigateway,sts,s3,cloudwatch,cloudformation -e LAMBDA_EXECUTOR=docker -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock localstack/localstack
scripts.stop_localstack: docker container stop $(docker container ls -q --filter name=localstack-${MYPORT}*)
scripts.predeploy: cd ./infra && npm run build && LOCALSTACK_HOSTNAME=localstack-${MYPORT} cdklocal bootstrap -v

author: braden rupp
